pages.title: Welcome
pages.content:
Welcome to html AI experiments.  
you'll find a some interesting things under this site.  
This html structure itself was generated by AI.  
It contains an editor version and the content is holded in a content.json file, that supports some sort of templating and markdown.  
Enjoy

pages.title: AI Experiments OpenAi
pages.content:
The projects above were generated iteratively from OpenAi free plan reasoning enabled. 
[Autoplayed Snake](https://Mythios-13.github.io/snake/snake.html)  
[Vector Game](https://Mythios-13.github.io/vectorgame/vector.html)  
[content.json Editor](https://Mythios-13.github.io/editor.html)  
[Mario like with editor](https://Mythios-13.github.io/mariolike/leveleditor.html)  
[WebXR Minecraft Like](https://Mythios-13.github.io/webXr/index.html)

pages.title: AI Experiments Copilot
pages.content: The projects above were generated iteratively with Copilot free in VS Code.

pages.title: About
pages.content: The code was generated iteratively with help of AI. OpenAi free plan reasoning enabled or Copilot free in VS Code.
